title: jaya mangaLa
sahitya:
jaya mangaLa nitya shubha mangaLa


caraNam 1    mangaLavu madukaita bhASura mardananige mangaLavu madanakOTi vilAsage 
mangaLavu karuNAntaranga shrIrangage mangaLavu shrIhAtri narasingage
    caraNam 2    shrIvatsalAmshake shrIdEviyarasage gOvardhanOddAra gOvindage 
mAva kamsana konda makara kuNDalinige jIvAtmanAda cinmaya rUpake
    caraNam 3    sakala guNa paripUrNanige sarva svantranige akaLanka rUpanige anankavittake 
bhaktavatsalanige bhavarOga vaidyanige sakala jIva dayApara mUrtige
    caraNam 4    pannaga shayananige pAvana critranige sannutAnanda sajjanapAlake 
ennudaiya purandara viTTala rAyanige tanna nambidavara salahuvanige
